about_the_game:
About the Demo:

The demo includes randomly generated map levels and two bosses, which can be played repeatedly. Demo does not save data and will not inherit it into the release version. The game title interface has two options to skip the event at the beginning of the game and start playing directly.

The complete game will provide more maps and equipment construction, with higher difficulty.

-Localization is mechanically translated and then personally corrected, and the translation may not be accurate

At some point, you woke up in an empty space surrounded by strange spatial disturbances. You can't remember why you're here, but fortunately, you still remember your name. Subconsciously, you thought you came here with a very important thing to do, but you have forgotten what to do.

Just when you were at a loss, a young girl with white hair quietly walked up to you and warmly said

This is a Roguelike game with equipment construction and character development as its core.

A little bit of action element rogue+survivor mode refers to a more selective space in the early stages of construction.

Shop to purchase items that enhance abilities

There are also three basic options for upgrading

Special room events

So, use your hands, pick up the guy, break into the strange world, and quell the chaos here!

content_descriptors.notes:
Wearing sexy clothing for women.
Monster with bones and skulls

name: ROGUE HANDS  Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A rogue game aimed at delivering a thrilling experience, crafting a powerful genre, and pushing forward to the end!
